name: Neon Spaсe Battle
description:
The new space battle in the style of a puzzle. Nothing superfluous only battle. Cheerful and colorful game. You have to kill the enemy spaceship for that you get points. Kill as many as possible and clean the universe from the enemy. The game is challenging and will make you sweat.
The game is very bright.

20 long missions
Good graphics and gameplay
10 bosses
Good governance
Remind dandy
